channel.title: Significant Battles or Wars Before 1000
channel.description: RSS feed of significant battles or wars before the year 1000.

item.title: Battle of Edington
item.description: The Battle of Edington or Battle of Ethandun was a battle between an army of the kingdom of Wessex under Alfred the Great and the Great Heathen Army led by Guthrum sometime between 6 and 12 May 878. Alfred's army won the battle, which resulted in the Treaty of Wedmore later that same year.
